p: Previous studies have evaluated the diagnostic performance of different serological assays for HEV IgG, IgM and to a lesser degree HEV IgA [ 11, 12]. Variability in the performance of such assays is common [ 13, 14, 15, 16], but false positive cases in healthy blood donors and false negative cases in patients with acute hepatitis seem to be rare [ 17, 18]. In our cohort, diagnosis of HEV infection was sufficient in immunocompetent patients when testing for both HEV IgM and IgG antibodies.
